{"id":396194741,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1600192599,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/396194741/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"6.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    \nprivate:\n    int getNumsSquares(int x) {\n        int cnt = 0;\n        while (x) {\n            cnt += pow(x % 10, 2);\n            x /= 10;\n        }\n        return cnt;\n    }\n    \npublic:\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        set<int> s;\n        while (n != 1) {\n            if (s.count(n) > 0) {\n                return false;\n            }\n            s.insert(n);\n            n = getNumsSquares(n);\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
